Class LinearHashing

java.lang.Object
LinearHashing
public class LinearHashing
extends java.lang.Object
implementation of linear hashing, its a dynamic data structure which implements a hash table,(hash table its a data structure that implements an associative array abstract data type, a structure that can map keys to values.)
Author:
ip
